items.name: Supply and spread  with selected material on the surface of floor area, the work shall include proper compaction at 25cm thick layer.
150mm thick basaltic stone hardcore well rolled, consolidated  and blinded with crushed stone .
Lean concrete of class C-5 with minimum cement content of 150 kg/m3 cast 7cm concrete of ratio mix 1:4:7 under masonry
concrete of class C-15 with minimum cement content of 360 kg/m3 cast place above hard core material To 100mm thick  ground floor slab 1:3:6
300mm thick hard trachytic roughly dressed stone masonry foundation wall below 0.5 m and 0.25 m above ground level bedded in cement mortar mix (1:3)
Supply and construct 150x200x400mm HCB wall with cement mortar 1:3 mix ratio. Height 2.4m and Gabel h= 0.8m
Erect RHS 60x60 x 1.5mm postsat veranda of the shelter  embedded in masonry wall- Height 250cm above FFL. price includes welding of  diameter 6 plain bars
Mass conceret C- 20 ratio(1:2:4)grade beam ( beam to be 0.2x0.15  and lintal beams on openings ( beam to be 0.15x0.15
Form work for grade beam and top tie ring beam
Mild steel bar reinforcement Dia. 6 deformed bar and Dia. 10 deformed bar for grade beam

Supply, assembly and fix in position eucalyptus roof truss (dia 10-12cm) 21.5 m in length @ 1.2 m c/c as per drawings. Price include the application of three coats and external anti-termite treatment: 5 trusses in number
Supply and fixing of Dia 8-10cm eucalyptus wooden poles at 90cm c/c spacing treated with black used oil for roof  purlins .price includes cost of nails  and all necessary works .
Supply and fix Corrugated iron  sheet  32   gauge for  roof . Roofing area to be calculated in a horizontal projection .price includes ridges, nails ,washers and all necessary works .

Supply Materials, manufacture and fix  doors out of  20mm thick wooden planks and eucalyptus frame Morale. Price includes 3 large size hinges, handle and inside and outside door latches (L=25cm) and three coat of anti termite

Supply Materials, manufacture and fix  90cmx90cm windows out of  20mm thick wooden planks and eucalyptus frames Morale. Price includes  large size hinges, handle and inside   latches (L=25cm) and three coat of anti termite
